name: WorkProductivity
title: Work Productivity
description: The person's ability to remain productive at work relating to their physical and mental health. (Business ID: Entry 2200728)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Work Productivity.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the person's ability to remain productive at work relating to their physical and mental health..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Work Productivity.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Work Productivity.)

contains.display: Productivity at work (finding)
Unable to undertake voluntary work (finding)
Difficulty undertaking voluntary work (finding)
Temporarily unable to perform work activities due to medical condition (finding)
How much did pain interfere with your ability to work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How often are you less effective at work due to your fatigue (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]

I was satisfied with my ability to work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]

Because of your headaches on how many days in the last 3 months did you miss work or school [PhenX]
Because of your headaches on how many days in the last 3 months was your productivity at work or school reduced by half or more [PhenX]
Does this loss of sleep affect you the next day with respect to your ability to get your work done [PhenX]
How does this loss of sleep affect you the next day with respect to your ability to get your work done [PhenX]
